text:
Four teenagers drowned in two different incidents here on Sunday.

In the first incident, 17-year-old Harish of Maratipalayam along with his friend 13-year-old Venkatesh of Anekal in Karnataka had gone for a swim in a neighbourhood well in Thally, when Harish drowned. Venkatesh made a futile bid to rescue Harish and was drowned. The bodies of the boys were retrieved by the locals.

In another incident, two boys from Salem and Namakkal, visiting a relative here were drowned in a lake. The victims Gopi (19) and his friend Abdul (13) had gone for a swim in Anangur Lake and never returned. The bodies of the boys were retrieved later.
title: Four drown in separate incidents
